      • login

        public boolean login(User user)
        Verifies if the user is in the data base. If it is sets preferences and userlogged in and returns true, if it's not returns false. In case of a google user if login wasn't successful, calls register.
        Parameters:
        user - user to try login
        Returns:
        true in case of success, false otherwise

      • register

        public boolean register(User user)
        Tries to add a new user in data base. If it wasn't successful returns false, if it was calls login.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        true in case of success, false otherwise

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Sets android preferences as -1 and user logged as null
